text: Shadows Fall is an American metalcore band formed in 1996. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Somber Eyes to the Sky (1997) * Of One Blood (2000) * The Art of Balance (2002) * The War Within (2004) * Threads of Life (2007) * Retribution (2009) * Fire from the Sky (2012) ==References== Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:Thrash metal bands Category:Metalcore bands Category:Musical groups established in 1996 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2015 Category:Musical groups from Boston Category:Atlantic Records artists
title: Shadows Fall
